title: Elegant Charlottesville Jeffersonian-Style Stay on the UVA Darden School of Business Campus
description: Discover the city of Charlottesville from the stately building of Kimpton The Forum Hotel, an IHG Hotel. This magnificent, five-story structure, inspired by the iconic Jeffersonian style, commands a prominent position overlooking the entrance to the esteemed Darden School of Business, at the University of Virginia . Find a cosy leather seat at The Good Sport for a nightly pint and dine on hearty steak at the elegant Birch & Bloom. The next morning, peruse the scenic arboretum and botanical gardens while soaking up the sunshine.
location_description: Kimpton The Forum Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 540 Massie Rd, Charlottesville, Virginia, 22903, United States

title: Sophisticated Richmond City Retreat near Iconic Shockhoe Slip with Restaurant & Indoor Pool
description:
Experience the old-world charms of Virginia's capital with a stay at this historic Richmond address, a beacon of Southern hospitality and elegance. Perfectly situated mere moments from the treasured Shockoe Slip district, Virginia State Capitol and the idyllic James River, this architectural gem makes for easy explorations in the 'Mother of States'.

Unwind in the modern and beautifully appointed rooms, go for a swim in the tranquil indoor pool, savour the flavours of the South at Westham Porch and tuck into locally inspired plates and sip on craft cocktails at the lively Westham Tavern. For a taste of culture, the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts and the American Civil War Museum are just a short drive away.
offer_address: 100 South 12th Street, Richmond, Virginia 23219, United States
